itemDisplayName: Deploy a VM with Chocolatey installed
description: This template allows you to create a VM with an application from Chocolatey installed. Currently the custom script to launch the choco install is being pulled from https://iaasscripts.blob.core.windows.net/scripts/InstallApplication.ps1. Once the Custom Script Extension is updated to pull from any URL it will be updated to pull directly from GitHub.
summary: Deploy a VM with Chocolatey installed
